name: fighting game (ynjoscobi2, brorsan)
description:
it is fightingGame 2.0.0

There are 15 characters!!! (and 3 additional banned characters Frog, Can and Rat (not tournament legal). 

All characters have 4 attacks and an ultimate attack

CONTROLS: X C V B(player 1) U I O P(player 2) to attack. down for ultimate. 

controllers should work just try all the buttons for controls. when a single or multiple controllers are plugged in while the game is started there will be that number of extra players in the game.

when picking a character you can press R to get a random one and backspace to undo your selection.

by pressing 1 or 2 you toggle player 1 and 2 between default, not existing and being an ai. 

its a very good game.(gg)
